title: Stillness is Key ( Ryan Holiday interview and Latham Thomas Interview)
itunes:title: Stillness is Key ( Ryan Holiday interview and Latham Thomas Interview)
description:
Today on the show we had author Ryan Holiday speak about his new book "Stillness Is Key" and more. Also, we had wellness/lifestyle maven Latham Thomas stop by where she spoke about high morality rates in black women, doula transforming and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Florida Judge who gave a 21 year old 10 day sentence for missing jury duty.   

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
